meanings.definition: A disk-shaped storage medium for video data.
meanings.sent1: I watched a movie on the videodisks.
meanings.sent2: The videodisks contained all our favorite TV shows.
meanings.sent3: The videodisks were having a party in the DVD player.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library of videodisks storing memories.
meanings.sent5: The videodisks gleamed like tiny mirrors reflecting light.

meanings.definition: To record or reproduce video data on a disk.
meanings.sent1: We need to videodisks our family vacation for memories.
meanings.sent2: He videodisksed the school play for everyone to see.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to videodisks its own shadow on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter videodisksed through the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The camera videodisksed the sunset, capturing its beauty forever.
